entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as a character who growled and spoke in the text. He is described as saying 'You know who used to like using the Dark Lord's name, Weasley?'.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as a character whose name was used by someone in the past. Greyback says 'The Order of the Phoenix. Mean 448 Malfoy Manor anything to you? You know who used to like using the Dark Lord's name, Weasley?'.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is mentioned as an organization that was referred to by Greyback. He says 'You know who used to like using the Dark Lord's name, Weasley? The Order of the Phoenix. Mean 448 Malfoy Manor anything to you?'.

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is mentioned as a location by Greyback. He says 'Mean 448 Malfoy Manor anything to you?'

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as a title used by someone in the past. Greyback says 'You know who used to like using the Dark Lord's name, Weasley?'.

entities.name: tabooed
entities.description: Tabooed is mentioned as a verb that was applied to the Dark Lord's name. Greyback says 'Well, they don't show the Dark Lord proper respect, so the name's been Tabooed'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who was being dragged and bound by someone. He says 'This is all my fault. I said the name. I'm sorry â€” '

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a character who was tied to Harry's right side. He says 'No.'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a character who was tied to Harry's left side. She says 'No.'

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as a character whose voice was familiar but new to Harry. He says 'Harry?' It was a new, but familiar voice. And it came from directly behind Harry, from the person tied to Hermione's left.'

entities.name: prisoners
entities.description: The prisoners are mentioned as a group of people who were being bound by someone. Harry says 'Anyone still got a wand?'

relationships.description: Greyback and Weasley are mentioned together in the text when Greyback says 'You know who used to like using the Dark Lord's name, Weasley?'
Greyback and The Order of the Phoenix are mentioned together in the text when Greyback says 'The Order of the Phoenix. Mean 448 Malfoy Manor anything to you?'
Harry and Ron are tied together as prisoners in the text when Harry says 'Anyone still got a wand?'
Harry and Hermione are tied together as prisoners in the text when Harry says 'Anyone still got a wand?'
Dean spoke to Harry in the text when Dean said 'Harry?' It was a new, but familiar voice. And it came from directly behind Harry, from the person tied to Hermione's left.'
